DOC.detailed_description: Disease background : MM plasma cell tumor . It account estimate 20,180 new case cancer 11,170 death United States 2010 . With prevalence 23 per 100,000 people , MM orphan disease ( prevalence < 5:10,000 ) . The median age diagnosis 60-65 year . Although MM remain incurable , unprecedented gain survival outcome achieve last three decade . Survival improve mainly young patient age 65 advent high-dose melphalan therapy follow autologous stem cell transplantation ( ASCT ) . In last 10 year introduction novel therapy , thalidomide , lenalidomide bortezomib improve overall survival . However , patient ultimately relapse require salvage therapy . Therapy background : The main decision criterion first-line treatment selection patient 's eligibility high-dose chemotherapy melphalan subsequent ASCT . Patients eligible treatment , due advance age , comorbidities poor performance status , routinely treat combination melphalan , prednisone novel agent thalidomide , bortezomib lenalidomide . Currently , patient relapse first line therapy median 2-3 year diagnosis . Achieving near complete remission maintain residual tumor mass control consider mainstay current treatment MM . Treatment relapsed/refractory myeloma base double triple combination novel agent lenalidomide bortezomib dexamethasone and/or cytotoxic drug alkylators anthracyclines . The choice regimen relapse depend frontline therapy well disease- therapy-related comorbidities . Although patient achieve long lasting remission novel agent MM remain chronic disease . Patients invariably relapse become refractory second later line treatment . Therefore new treatment option late-line patient require . The combination lenalidomide bortezomib report show activity subset lenalidomide bortezomib double-refractory patient phase I/II trial recent retrospective data suggest bortezomib contain regimen may active lenalidomide-refractory myeloma patient . There approved treatment option lenalidomide bortezomib double-refractory patient . Possible therapeutic alternative carfilzomib pomalidomide still clinical development date clinical trial open Switzerland . Therefore , treatment option lenalidomide-refractory patient remain limited . Preclinical result NCI60 cancer cell line panel show HIV protease inhibitor nelfinavir exhibit wide spectrum antitumor activity . They inhibit proliferation 60 cancer cell line derive nine different tumor type . This consistent previous report demonstrate HIV protease inhibitor effective disease like MM Kaposi sarcoma . Nelfinavir induces cell cycle arrest apoptosis tumor cell inhibition proteasomal degradation PI3K/Akt pathway . Therefore preclinical evidence underscore proteasome inhibiting activity nelfinavir . Modulation proteasome function rational approach overcome chemo-resistance achieve chemo-sensitization , suggest addition agent myeloma standard treatment could restore sensitivity standard therapy . Pharmacologic intervention PI3K/Akt pathway induce cell death MM cell line primary tumor sample . These data suggest important role Akt pathway malignant growth survival MM cell also vivo . The addition nelfinavir standard lenalidomide/dexamethasone treatment lenalidomide-refractory patient expect restore sensitivity myeloma cell lenalidomide , act via inhibition PI3K/Akt pathway modulation proteasome function . Treatment Lenalidomide : Lenalidomide ( Revlimid ) derivative thalidomide . The exact mechanism action immunomodulatory drug know . Apart interfere immune system , also think act angiogenesis . There multiple mechanism action , simplify organize mechanisms action vitro vivo . In vitro , lenalidomide three main activity : direct anti-tumor effect , inhibition micro-environmental support tumor cell , immunomodulatory role . In vivo , lenalidomide induces tumor cell apoptosis directly indirectly inhibition bone marrow stromal cell support , anti-angiogenic anti-osteoclastogenic effect , immunomodulatory activity . Lenalidomide broad range activity exploit treat many hematologic solid cancer . Lenalidomide one novel drug agent use treat MM . It small molecular analogue thalidomide originally find base ability effectively inhibit tumor necrosis factor alpha ( TNF-α ) production . Lenalidomide 50,000 time potent thalidomide inhibit TNF-α , less severe adverse drug reaction . The important side effect lenalidomide thromboembolism hematological toxicity . The common side effect neutropenia , thrombopenia , anemia , fatigue , constipation , diarrhea , asthenia rash . In contrast thalidomide , lenalidomide cause neuropathy .
